name: Die Recompile ZERO
description:
Overview

Hey you, can you walk? 

Whelp, looks like I died again. 

Whoa! This one actually remembers dying?

In Die, Recompile, death is not the end. Upon dying your next clone takes over, and all the destruction you've caused remains!

Your mission is to shoot your way out of an underground facility swamped with colorful monsters in this fast-paced rogue-lite bullet hell. Don’t hesitate to use the walls to your advantage, they might just help you find a shortcut to the next level. Power up your guns and get ready to battle some tough monsters on the way to the top. Who knows, you might just spot your old self among them.

Features
  • Hectic gameplay
  • Destructable world
  • 28 different dope weapons
  • Pickups
  • 3 different areas
  • Cool enemies
  • Rad characters

Have any suggestions or bug reports? 
Please let us know on our Discord server!
